content: I don’t know your favorite color yet—tell me and I’ll remember it for next time [MM1, M2]. You can choose from a few options: blue, green, black, purple, red, or orange.

meta.content:
I don’t know your favorite color yet—tell me and I’ll remember it for next time.

## TL;DR
- Share it once and I’ll save it.

## Quick reply
- “Remember: my favorite color is <color>.”

## Note
- If you’ve told me before, it’s not in this session’s memory—please restate it and I’ll pin it.
